Definition: Given two phrases, Head and Tail, your task is to determine whether The Tail is the intention of the person from the Head. If it is, classify your answer as "Yes". If it is not, classify your answer as "No". The phrase may also contain "___", a placeholder that can be an object, a person, and/or an action.
Domains: Commonsense -> Concepts and Relations -> Social Commonsense

Positive Examples.input: Head: PersonX plays a song<sep>Tail: to hear music.
